item.title: About Mark
item.author: mark@markrichman.com (Mark Richman)
item.description: Mark Richman dramatically improves the speed and quality of software innovation. -- MarkÂ works with clients to develop the people, processes, technologies, skills, and strategies required to achieve tactical objectives and strategic goals. Mark offers a unique combination of deep technical and business expertise, and a strong track record of success. Mark has built, grown, and driven software engineering teams for organizations of all sizes. Mark is the coauthor of the 2001 book Professional XML Web Services (Wrox Press).
